_trace.rawText:
{
   "metadata": {
      "template": "circle-basic",
      "appName": "德州餐厅",
      "packageId": "com.ndjc.dtxc",
      "mode": "B"
   },
   "anchors": {
      "text": {
         "NDJC:PACKAGE_NAME": "com.ndjc.dtxc",
         "NDJC:APP_LABEL": "德州餐厅",
         "NDJC:HOME_TITLE": "菜品介绍",
         "NDJC:PRIMARY_BUTTON_TEXT": "上传照片",
         "NDJC:THEME_NAME": "CircleBasicTheme",
         "NDJC:DARK_MODE": "auto",
         "NDJC:FONT_FAMILY_PRIMARY": "system",
         "NDJC:FONT_FAMILY_SECONDARY": "system",
         "NDJC:I18N_ENABLED": "true",
         "NDJC:ANIM_ENABLED": "true",
         "NDJC:ANIM_DURATION_MS": "300",
         "NDJC:LAYOUT_DENSITY": "comfortable",
         "NDJC:DATA_SOURCE": "local",
         "NDJC:SEED_ENABLED": "false",
         "NDJC:FEED_SORT": "latest",
         "NDJC:PAGING_SIZE": "20",
         "NDJC:OFFLINE_POLICY": "read_through_cache",
         "NDJC:PRIVACY_POLICY": "https://www.dtxc.com/privacy",
         "NDJC:DRAFT_ENABLED": "true",
         "NDJC:USE_APP_BUNDLE": "true",
         "NDJC:BUILD_META_RUNID": "1",
         "NDJC:FEATURE_TOGGLE_MIN": "baseline",
         "NDJC:DEBUG_LOG_ENABLED": "false",
         "NDJC:RUN_ID": "1",
         "NDJC:LOG_LEVEL": "info",
         "NDJC:METRICS_ENABLED": "false",
         "NDJC:CRASHLYTICS_ENABLED": "false",
         "NDJC:EXPERIMENT_BUCKET": "dtxc"
      },
      "block": {
         "BLOCK:HOME_HEADER": "<!-- __HOME_HEADER__ -->",
         "BLOCK:HOME_BODY": "<!-- __HOME_BODY__ -->",
         "BLOCK:HOME_ACTIONS": "<!-- __HOME_ACTIONS__ -->",
         "BLOCK:THEME_COLORS": "{ /* __THEME_COLORS__ */ }",
         "BLOCK:TYPOCASE_OVERRIDES": "",
         "BLOCK:STRINGS_EXTRA": "",
         "BLOCK:ROUTE_HOME": "home",
         "BLOCK:ROUTE_DETAIL": "detail/{id}",
         "BLOCK:ROUTE_POST": "post",
         "BLOCK:NAV_TRANSITIONS": "",
         "BLOCK:SPLASH_CONTENT": "",
         "BLOCK:EMPTY_STATE": "<!-- __EMPTY__ -->",
         "BLOCK:ERROR_STATE": "<!-- __ERROR__ -->",
         "BLOCK:DEPENDENCY_SNIPPETS": "",
         "BLOCK:DEBUG_PANEL": "",
         "BLOCK:BUILD_SUMMARY": "",
         "BLOCK:HEADER_AD_SLOT": "",
         "BLOCK:FEED_ITEM_BADGES": "",
         "BLOCK:USER_PROFILE_CARD": "",
         "BLOCK:SPONSORED_CARD": "",
         "BLOCK:PROFILE_SECTION": "",
         "BLOCK:SETTINGS_SECTION": ""
      },
      "list": {
         "LIST:PROGUARD_EXTRA": [],
         "LIST:PACKAGING_RULES": [],
         "LIST:ROUTES": [
            "home",
            "detail/{id}",
            "post"
         ],
         "LIST:POST_FIELDS": [
            "title",
            "description",
            "price",
            "image"
         ],
         "LIST:COMMENT_FIELDS": [
            "content",
            "rating"
         ],
         "LIST:ABI_SPLITS": [],
         "LIST:PLURAL_STRINGS": [],
         "LIST:COMPONENT_STYLES": [],
         "LIST:REMOTE_FLAGS": [],
         "LIST:DEEPLINK_PATTERNS": []
      },
      "if": {
         "IF:PERMISSION.CAMERA": true,
         "IF:PERMISSION.MEDIA": true,
         "IF:PERMISSION.NOTIFICATION": false,
         "IF:PERMISSION.LOCATION": false,
         "IF:PERMISSION.CONTACTS": false,
         "IF:PERMISSION.SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM": false,
         "IF:PERMISSION.CLIPBOARD": false,
         "IF:NETWORK.CLEAR_TEXT": false,
         "IF:FILE_PROVIDER": true,
         "IF:INTENT.SHARE": true
      },
      "hook": {
         "HOOK:BEFORE_BUILD": "",
         "HOOK:AFTER_BUILD": "",
         "HOOK:PRE_INJECT": "",
         "HOOK:POST_INJECT": "",
         "HOOK:PRE_COMMIT": "",
         "HOOK:AFTER_INSTALL": ""
      },
      "gradle": {
         "applicationId": "com.ndjc.dtxc",
         "resConfigs": [
            "en",
            "zh-rCN",
            "zh-rTW"
         ],
         "permissions": [
            "android.permission.CAMERA",
            "android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE",
            "android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"
         ]
      }
   },
   "files": []
}
